name: bb-web-research-prototypes
description: Business Banking Web Research Prototypes for July 2025

scripts.install:all: cd 'BB Web - Research - July 2025/prototype-1' && npm install && cd '../prototype-2' && npm install
scripts.dev:prototype1: cd 'BB Web - Research - July 2025/prototype-1' && npm run dev
scripts.dev:prototype2: cd 'BB Web - Research - July 2025/prototype-2' && npm run dev
scripts.build:prototype1: cd 'BB Web - Research - July 2025/prototype-1' && npm run build
scripts.build:prototype2: cd 'BB Web - Research - July 2025/prototype-2' && npm run build
scripts.serve:local: npm run build:local && cd dist && npx serve . -p 8000
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf 'BB Web - Research - July 2025/prototype-1/out' && rm -rf 'BB Web - Research - July 2025/prototype-2/out'

author: Monzo Business Banking Team
